google_reviews.author: Marta
google_reviews.review:
Hello everyone, I recently moved into a property managed by PURE, and the experience has been fantastic. From the start, everything went smoothly, thanks to Celese, who helped us move in. She was incredibly professional, friendly, and attentive to our needs, making the transition seamless.

The property itself was in excellent condition, and any minor issues we encountered were promptly addressed by the team. The level of communication and support from PURE has been top-notch, giving us peace of mind as new tenants.

Overall, I highly recommend PURE. Their exceptional service and dedicated staff, especially Celese, have made our move a great experience. Thank you for making us feel so welcome!

owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that your experience with PURE has been fantastic. Celese is truly an asset to our team, and it's great to know she made your move-in process smooth and enjoyable. We take pride in maintaining our properties and providing excellent support, so its rewarding to hear that you felt well taken care of. Welcome to your new home, and thank you for recommending us! If you ever need anything, dont hesitate to reach out.
PURE Property Management of Washington!

google_reviews.author: Reynaldo R. Lima (Rich)
google_reviews.review: We had the pleasure of working with Eldar at PURE, and we couldnt be more impressed! From the moment we connected, Eldars professionalism and friendly demeanor stood out. He made the entire process seamless and stress-free, answering all of our questions with patients and expertise. We are genuinely excited to move forward with pure property management and feel confident in the exceptional service they provide. Thank you, Eldar, for your outstanding support!!

google_reviews.author: Sarah Kooy
google_reviews.review: Horrible property management. I have been trying to contact them for months about a tree issue and have received no response. So because I live next door to the property that you manage you dont feel like you have no responsibility to respond to my many phone calls and emails? I have heard nothing. I dont know what the homeowners response was to my request. Horrible customer service!

owner_response.text:
Sarah,

We do not manage your property nor are you a resident with our company.  
 We received your calls and promptly relayed the details of your tree request to the property owner. However, our role revolves around facilitating communication and passing along information, rather than making decisions on behalf of the property owner.

Ultimately, the decision regarding the requested tree is at the sole discretion of the property owner. We respect their autonomy in such matters and honor their right to make choices aligned
with their preferences and the property's overall vision.

google_reviews.author: Corrmick M
google_reviews.review:
Broken walls that arent attached to floor or ceiling, no keys to a back door that leads to a non secure back yard, days to respond to anything, hot water completely shuts off (no water even comes out randomly), no fans in the bathrooms, they listed my unit as having a bedroom but the bedroom has no windows or fire escapes, broken flooring thats loose and floating off the subfloor, gaps in the floor big enough to get slivers as your foot makes the flooring sag, outdated two prong outlets everywhere, holes drilled through exterior doors and window frames that werent sealed allowing bugs in everywhere, they charge you around $200 in extra fees but cant even be bothered to to provide a secure unit.

The first week I asked calmly about these issues. It took me resorting to outrage to get a response that took twelve days and has yet to solve any issues.  This company is not worth losing your money to, absolutely embarrassing that they call themselves professional but cant even rent a secure unit out.

google_reviews.author: Nurkyial Saparova
google_reviews.review: As a property owner Ive been very pleased with pure management. They are reliable proactive and always keep my best interest in mind was while managing my rent. Thank you for best property Jesse and Celese!

owner_response.text:
Hi Nurkyial,
Thank you so much for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear that youre pleased with our management services. Jesse and Celese work hard to ensure your interests are prioritized, and your feedback means a lot to us. If you ever need anything, dont hesitate to reach out!

google_reviews.author: Leslie Lyon
google_reviews.review: We rented from Pure for about a year all in all move in was simple and executed well. My partner and I separated and left our lease after one year.  The New Property Manager Celese Thompson made the process very simple for me as I moved out of state and all the things that involves with closing a lease and being co-tenants.  She was so communicative and helpful offering valuable solutions. Highly recommend them and especially Celese.

google_reviews.author: Baiz
google_reviews.review: Great property management company! We rented a house from them and super happy. The process was pretty easy and quick!

owner_response.text:
Hello Baiz,
Thank you so much for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear that youre pleased with our management services. Jesse and Celese work hard to ensure your interests are prioritized, and your feedback means a lot to us. If you ever need anything, dont hesitate to reach out!

google_reviews.author: Robert Sensel
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge has been exemplary with there services for my rentals for the last two years. So good in fact that I originally planned to only use them for two years, but, the services have been so trouble free with zero issues, I felt a fool to end such a good relationship and chose to continue through the foreseeable future. Kudos to the entire Leading edge team! Thanks for the professionalism and the great service. Any Landloard not using you is loosing money.

owner_response.text: Robert, thank you for sharing your kind words.  We really enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Normajean Bowen (Nia)
google_reviews.review:
Stacey at Leading Edge Property Management has managed my property for years.  She carefully screens and selects tenants who maintain and care for the property and I have a low turn-over rate. The financial statements are always on time and professionally executed.
She also keeps good track of the home's condition, allowing me to plan in advance for future maintenance needs.
I appreciate and value the peace of mind and stability that I've been able to enjoy due to the great services Stacey and Leading Edge Property Management provide.
I highly recommend this business to any property owner!

owner_response.text: Thank you Normajean, it has been a pleasure to work with you all these years.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to many more years together!

google_reviews.author: Maria Uchytil
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge has been wonderful to work with. They work with you to make sure all your questions are answered in a timely manner. Especially Leticia has been working with me and I really appreciate her and the entire team.

owner_response.text:
We wanted to take a moment to express our sincerest gratitude for your kind words and appreciation for Leading Edge. We are delighted to hear that your experience with us has been nothing short of wonderful.

At Leading Edge, we strive to provide exceptional customer service and ensure that all inquiries are addressed promptly. It brings us great joy to know that our team, particularly Laetitia, has been instrumental in assisting you and providing the support you needed. I will make sure to pass along your appreciation to her and the entire team. We genuinely value your business and the trust you have placed in us. Once again, thank you for your kind words. It is our pleasure to serve you, and we look forward to continuing our partnership with you.

google_reviews.author: Alyvia Miller
google_reviews.review: As a tenant, working with Ms. Mora was a pleasant experience. Im used to property managers dragging their feet to get anything done, but she got our maintenance request handled quickly and efficiently, and made sure to follow up when the first plumber had not completed all parts of the job!

google_reviews.author: Josh Carter
google_reviews.review: Wish I could leave a negative review. This is an absolutely horrible and down right disgusting rental company dont waste your time going through them and dont expect your deposit back soo if you do rent through them just leave the place trashed when you leave. When we moved out of the resident we were ever paying in rent the house should be condemned and we actually left it cleaner than when we moved in and they have the audacity to send me a $100 check out of the $2500 deposit I had to put down to move in to the run down brick house from the 40s that is literally falling apart. Just absolutely ridiculous horrible company

owner_response.text:
Dear Josh, 
We at PURE Property Management of Washington are deeply concerned to hear about your negative experience with our rental property. Your feedback is crucial to us, and we take it very seriously.

We would like to investigate the issues you've raised. Could you please provide more details about your rental experience, such as the address of the property, the dates of your tenancy, and specific examples of the problems you encountered?

We strive to provide quality rental properties and exceptional customer service. Please know that we are committed to resolving any issues that may arise.
Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns.

Please email us at bellingham@purepm.co

Sincerely,
PURE Property Management of Washington

google_reviews.author: Megan Breen
google_reviews.review: I have had the pleasure of working with Stacey over the past year and she is THE BEST. No better company to trust with your property. Leading Edge always picks up the phone, has incredible marketing for their listings (best in the area) and truly cares about each of their clients. HIGHLY recommend!

google_reviews.author: Smith Plumbing
google_reviews.review: We have worked with Leading Edge for a few years in both regular hours and after hours emergency calls. Their team is easy to get ahold of and communicate with. As a contractor its nice to work with another company who has great communication and high customer service standards.

google_reviews.author: Jeniffer F.
google_reviews.review: I've rented for 1yr 6 months with this company. Had to move because the owner didn't want to rent anymore. It has been over a month and I still haven't received my security deposit and the property is already listed for sale. I've been calling, left messages and no call back to explain what is going on. I visited the office everyday and it's always locked and has a sign saying all managers are in the field. Why would they have an office if they are always on the field, makes no sense. It's very unprofessional that the company does not return my calls or emails to explain what is going on. I've rented from different management companies and I've always gotten my security deposit within a month from the move out date. I am very disappointed with this management company.

google_reviews.author: Lisa Marie
google_reviews.review: Best property management company I have ever worked with. If I were to ever move back to the area and needed a rental I would 100% reach out to them. Gayle made the application and move-in process easy. Office was always responsive to any inquiries I had during my 18month stay. Super quick with repairs as well, next day turnaround! Thanks Leading Edge for a great experience!!

google_reviews.author: Amanda Cronin
google_reviews.review: Stacey is efficient, professional, and kind. I have worked with her in different capacities, and every time she shows an attention to detail and focus that I appreciate immensely. Her responses are punctual and helpful; she goes out of her way to meet her clients' needs. Stacey also has a big heart and is always giving back to her community - this is the cherry on top of her already-stellar services! I'd highly recommend her and her team to anyone in the community.

google_reviews.author: Anderson Schulle
google_reviews.review: If you are looking for a property management company who you can trust and who will do what's best for you and your rental property, look no further. Stacey is a professional who cares, and you will notice this throughout her team and how she operates her business. These are people who continuously work on their skill set, processes and knowledge, so that they can provide high quality services. If you are looking for professionals who care, entrust your rentals to Leading Edge Property Management.

google_reviews.author: Abi Wasserman Ortscheid
google_reviews.review: Stacey has been a client of mine for a little while now and I cannot tell you how grateful we are to have her in our family of clients. Her attention to detail and process focused culture for her clients has been a pleasure to serve and I'm looking forward to seeing her continued success for Leading Edge. Highly recommend the entire team at Leading Edge!

google_reviews.author: Molly S
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management is amazing! Had a very disappointing experience with a previous property management company and Leading Edge saved the day!!! So thankful to have professionals on our side!!! Dont even waste your time with anyone else... Leading Edge is the BEST, most knowledgeable, professional, always dialed-in, and up-to-date with EVERYTHING!!!

google_reviews.author: Corrmick Moran
google_reviews.review: Almost a week and my missing bedroom still hasnt been resolved. They admitted to using false advertising, they know they didnt provide me with the terms of our agreement but they still cant seem to resolve the issue or communicate. Also, they engage in clear review manipulation as if you scroll back many of the new reviews are just from industry folks. This company treats tenants like second class people, fully acknowledging that we in their community are nothing more then products for them to use.

google_reviews.author: Sweet Bunnee
google_reviews.review: Wish I could give them zero stars, have had nothing but problems since the beginning from falsely advertised unit to the clear evidence there was little to no inspection before renting as most things are broken or poorly constructed. Communication is incredibly slow and poor, they charge a rental package thats supposed to include setting up your utilities but we still had to call the gas company to setup our own gas and then dealt with scary gas and carbon monoxide leaks in the unit due to an ancient valve that shouldnt have even been there and then when replaced wasnt even tightened properly. I could go on and on but honestly Id run the other direction if I saw they were the property managers for any future rentals, will never do business with them again.

owner_response.text:
Hi,
We do not have a record of you renting or on any lease with Leading Edge in WA state. We're sorry to hear you've been having challenges with what seems to be the move-in process. Our tenants do indeed have access to the inspection report of the property as well as the utility concierge service. We would be happy to assist you in finding the report and utilizing the concierge service as well as discussing your concerns mentioned. Feel free to use our team email address which is constantly monitored by a team member during our business hours: care@leadingedgerealestate.info

google_reviews.author: Casey Miller
google_reviews.review: Extremely professional company that cares about their clients as well as the community. I appreciate working with local business that are invested in making our community a better place to live. I highly recommend Stacey and her team to anyone that wants to work with detail oriented professionals. Owning a rental is one thing, managing tenants is another. Let a professional make sure everyone is taken care of and happy!

google_reviews.author: Casey Ross
google_reviews.review: I have rented from Leading Edge for over 2 years. I am so grateful for their service. I have never had a landlord who is so responsive, helpful and communicative from beginning to end! Thank you for being the best and providing a home for our family!

google_reviews.author: The Hansen's
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge is managing two of our properties.  They produced beautiful pictures and video for the house that was vacant and actively pursued leads for the best tenant.  Gayle has been a star with both homes and appreciate the work she has done, visiting the other home for safety inspections to ensure the home is being well taken care of and in good working order.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words!  We agree that Gayle is a superstar and we're thrilled that you think so too.

google_reviews.author: Chris Hayes
google_reviews.review: I was lucky enough to get in contact with Gayle one of the property managers at this fine organization! I was inquiring about their services they offered and if my organization and theirs would be able to work together and Gayle was remarkably friendly as well as informative and helpful! Im very glad to have gotten in contact with Leading Edge Property Management and Gayle in particular!!

google_reviews.author: Matt J
google_reviews.review: Very helpful, friendly, professional, and they do care about the tenants... always checking in and just making sure everything is going good. And for any reason any of us may need something fixed, or a question or anything for that reason!!! They are very understanding and very quick to respond to any issues or questions.. definitely recommend looking into leading edge property management...  Thank you all so much at leading edge property management

owner_response.text: Thank you Matt! Happy to hear it

google_reviews.author: Brian Sweeney
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge/Stacey Salyer handles our rental properties and have done a wonderful job. Stacey has always been available with any questions and have always been prompt and professional. I strongly recommend Stacey and Leading Edge

owner_response.text: Thank you Brian, we enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Jon Brady
google_reviews.review: I've had few issues typical in a rented house such as venetian blinds breaking (plastic doesn't last forever), a leaking toilet, a fence that was blown down in a windstorm. Each time I have to say these folks were prompt and courteous with the repairs. At this point I have no concerns giving them 5 stars.

owner_response.text: Thank you, Jon, for taking the time to share your positive experience with our company on Google. We are delighted to hear that our team was able to meet your expectations and that you feel confident in awarding us with a five-star rating. We value and appreciate your feedback!

google_reviews.author: Laura W Wilson
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge PM has been terrific to work with from the start. Knowledgeable, professional, responsive and reliable in everyway. Stacey salyer and the excellent members of her team - Gayle and others - have been helpful with repairs, record keeping, service recommendations and more. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Vicky Methven - Methven Agency Inc.
google_reviews.review: Working with Stacey is always a pleasure.  I love dealing with people who run their businesses at the top end of their profession...  Level headed, educated professional and leader in the Property Management / RE industry, Stacey never forgets that she is the 1st, 2nd and sometimes 3rd level of protection for her clients investments and she doesn't take it lightly.  Thanks for being such a joy to work with...  Cheers to many years to come.

owner_response.text: Thank you Vicky, we appreciate your kind words.  Always a pleasure doing business with you!

google_reviews.author: Madison Chapman
google_reviews.review: I currently live in California and called Gail Acidera for information on rentals. I got the most wonderful and professional help I have ever received. I highly recommend Leading Edge Property Management. I cannot wait to continue doing business with this company. Gail Deserve a billion kudos for her amazing customer service.

google_reviews.author: Jaiden
google_reviews.review: BEWARE OF LEADING EDGE PROPERTY MANAGEMENT. This property management found a legal loop hole to displace my single mom and her 3 kids during the pandemic, stating in a letter that they intend to move into the property themselves within 60 days. Prior to this during their lease, they contacted the management about a septic problem with the house. The management did not send someone out to check the issue and continued to be unresponsive. During the wait our family was able to check the states public records that proved that their property's septic tank had yet to be cleaned for the past 10 years despite the legal requirement. Since this timely septic issue affected every toilet in the house and wasnt resolved, they hired a personal handyman to clean the tank and communicated so. The property management was then responsive, asking for reimbursment for not only "tampering" with the septic tank, but for "tampons" that apparently clogged the tank despite never actually investigating the issue. After moving, the management continues to contact the family about owing money for the carpet, despite already paying the usual carpet cleaning fee. They are putting a single mother in dept. DO NOT lease with this management.

owner_response.text:
Hello Jaiden, we did not have a lease with you so we are unable to know what property you are referencing.
It is correct that we did issue several 60 and 90- day notices for clients who either wanted to move back into the rental property they owned or sell it.  We were following the WA State moratorium rules and our clients direction.
We do welcome the leaseholder to contact us directly about any questions they may have had during their tenancy.
Thank you.

google_reviews.author: Samuel Borthwick
google_reviews.review: Stacey and her team are amazing! Not only do they run a streamline service for landlords. But she is also consistently researching and staying informed and educating her clients on what new  tenant/landlord laws are coming. For anyone who is looking for the best. Look no further :)

owner_response.text: Thank you Samuel for your kind words, we really appreciate it!

google_reviews.author: Atwan Kwan
google_reviews.review: Trust is my biggest thing when it comes to leasing.... There's just countless potential nightmares that keep me up.... But Leading Edge feels easy with Stacey's personable and Helpful approach. She loves what she does and it gives me full confidence

google_reviews.author: Robert Melvin
google_reviews.review:
Very professional, prompt and courteous.
Gayle has supplied the face of zLeading
Edge-very good
Gayle is the third property manager I
have had for this property-no names
This company took about 4 months
to turn a vacancy on this unit-and left
behind appliances not functioning.
The next guy started well but indealing
with this move out he seemed to lose
prespective-he is gone.
Gayle seems to be doing very well
,and I have no question she will continue.

google_reviews.author: Anonymous
google_reviews.review: Madison was really on top of things. Great communication and if she wasnt available, she set us up with someone who was. Great customer service and helped me out a ton. She was very sweet and sincere. Ill update more once I get a reply on the maintenance end.

owner_response.text: Thank you Kevin for your kind words about your experience with Leading Edge.  We are happy to hear Madison provided excellent customer service during your move in process.

google_reviews.author: Chris Green
google_reviews.review: After over 9 years of renting through this company I was told I would not be able to rent the property anymore and was given less than 2 months to find another rental. In the 9 plus years of renting from this company they raised rent at every single opportunity they had. Since they fancy themselves as a "virtual company " they can be extremely difficult to reach or speak with in person. They also will force you to participate in several rental programs such as a furnace filter delivery services and others at a monthly expense to you on top of rent. Fair warning if you have pets you will be required to register them through one of their many 3rd party apps you are required to use at a cost to you upon every lease renewal date. You will also be subject to home inspections every 6 months. You will be given a time and date which is non negotiable because there schedule is just so busy. This company is definitely only interested in profiting as much as possible while doing as little as possible in the way of customer service. I would have never rented from this company as long as I have had my Wife and I not loved the location.

google_reviews.author: David Butler
google_reviews.review: I am a general contractor and have worked with Stacey in the past.  Stacey is a pleasure to work with.  She responds right with questions and is very exact with the scope of work she looking for, making it easier for us to complete projects.  I highly recommend Stacey for any and all of your property management needs

owner_response.text: Thank you David, it is always a pleasure to work with you!

google_reviews.author: Enrique Ortiz
google_reviews.review: As a property owner, I have had zero issues. When ever I have any concerns questions they are answered very promptly.This is a more modern company that has embraced the digital age. Emails are responded to same day and if really needed a phone is also returned. The owner portal allows me to easily keep track of all finances from rental income collected, management fees and any other expenses that arise.

owner_response.text: Thank you Enrique, it is a pleasure to work with you!

google_reviews.author: Cori Sieber
google_reviews.review:
Lending Edge used to be wonderful.  Friendly staff.  Until 1 year ago, they raised everyone rent $400.
The day the increase starts Oct 1.  Imagine that!
Oh,  and we have pay for their rents insurance even if your policy is better rents insurance.  They charge you $45 a month to have filter mailed you instead of us buying them for hella cheapier at Walmart, ect. I would never, ever recommend Lending Tree to anyone.

owner_response.text: Hi Cori, I tried calling and emailed you to discuss your questions about the rent increase and RBP.  I am happy to talk to you about the rent increase or anything else regarding our programs.  If you do have an equal/or better renters liability policy and name us as Additional Insured, we are opting residents out of that part of our RBP.  Here is more information about that on our site, https://www.edgehomerentals.com/resident-benefits-package.  Feel free to call me back at 425-312-2592, ext. 4, I am happy to talk with you.  Sincerely, Stacey Salyer

google_reviews.author: Brady Roberts
google_reviews.review: Stacey has been a great resource of knowledge for me and always eager to help me with my property managing questions.  As a new investor I know I can rely on Staceys expertise and guidance.  5/5 recommend whether you are managing many properties or just looking to get your foot in the door.

google_reviews.author: Miriam W
google_reviews.review:
I have not had a great experience with this company.

They didnt show for an appointment for a house showing and responded with there must be something wrong with the computer system.

The man on the phone did not offer an alternative solution or send someone out right away.

There was also another couple waiting with us with the same appointment, which we thought was odd.

I called again to reschedule and was given a date and time to choose. I chose today at 1:30pm

I just received an email saying I was confirmed for another date and time that is 3 days beyond what I chose. The email didnt reference our appointment today.

There seems to be a lapse in communication and a lack of desire to make good on situations with prospective tenants.

Very disappointed with the lack of ownership and responsibility of this company.

Integrity and honesty are my core values so when something isnt aligned with that, the universe does its job and spins people and companies out of my orbit. This seems to be one of those times.

May this review be helpful for those who need to see it. May this review also act as a reminder to those looking for a new home - keep following your intuitive guidance and gut feelings. If something feels off - it probably is!

google_reviews.author: Kevin Hagan
google_reviews.review: My furnace quit working and Leading Edge was notified.  They quickly dispatched a service technician on the same day.  I was very pleased with how it was , and how professional and courteous the technician was.  Thank you Leading Edge.

google_reviews.author: James Barrett
google_reviews.review: Stacey and team are great to work with! They always put others first and are focused on delivering an exceptional experience. I highly recommend Leading Edge Property Management!

owner_response.text: Thank you James for your kind words, we very much enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Cole Hockett
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management is a leader in the property management industry and is a testament to the best things about property management.  They are continuously educating the industry across the country about best practices and genuinely care for their customers and business relationships.  Leading Edge Property Management is the gold standard of what a management company should be.

owner_response.text: Thank you Cole for your kind words!

google_reviews.author: Bert Stubbs
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management took care of vetting new tenants and any issues and that arose during their occupancy of my rental property. They did this at a very reasonable cost taking the worry out of being a landlord.

google_reviews.author: Amanda Vanweerdhuizen
google_reviews.review: Fees fees fees, we rented from remax for 7 years when they switched to leading edge, first they sent us a new "lease" which was only month to month so no security of a stable home or amount of paying rent. Then the lease had fee upon fee which most just said "going rate" so to rekey 1 door cost 97 dollars I soon found out... 45 dollar benefits package that is no benefit just more money in their pockets. Also they do follow guidelines and laws sure, upped our rent 800dollars as soon as they could after covid restrictions were lifted, there's no limit on raising amounts in wa state and clearly they enjoy that law!! When I spoke to the owner about the lease and all these new things I didn't sign up for with remax she gave me the run around and when I moved out we paid all of the fees.. But I know of same discussions with other tenants where their lease got changed and those fees would not apply so not sure what made them special... I understand their are bad tenants and landlords get ripped off at times but it's really sad when good tenants then have to pay for it..

owner_response.text:
Hi Amanda,

We regret to hear that your experience with us was unsatisfactory. We do our best to be fair to all parties involved and increase rent based on market value. The last rent increase was years ago and no rent increases were allowed in WA state from March 2020 through June 30, 2021.  If you have concerns about your security deposit refund, you may submit a request through our website and we are happy to review your file once again. You can find more information about the process on this link: https://www.edgehomerentals.com/security-deposit.
Feel free to call us back at 425-312-2592 or email us at care@leadingedgerealestate.info. We look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,
Leading Edge Team

google_reviews.author: Christy P
google_reviews.review: We are pleased so far with our recent interactions with this property management company. Their interactive website is easy to use to place work orders when needed. They are responsive to emails and messages.

owner_response.text: Thank you Christy for your kind words, we are happy to hear our team is exceeding your expectations.

google_reviews.author: Leslie Lyon
google_reviews.review: We had such a seamless process and are so grateful for Gabby and the team at Lead Edge! Highly recommend for anyone moving to or within the area.

owner_response.text: Thank you, Leslie! We are happy our application/move in process was seamless for you.  Thank you for your kind words and we agree that Gabby is awesome.

google_reviews.author: Samantha Adams
google_reviews.review: I am a previous tenant, and ever since they disconnected my online services I have not been able to get through to an actual person. They take forever to get back to you, I moved out in July but I just got an email this morning from leading edge stating that I owe them rent and the late fee. Now they won't answer my calls.

google_reviews.author: Juan Magaa
google_reviews.review: Terrible place to rent from. The landlord switched to these folks within our last 2 years at the rental and they managed to up the rent over $1000 in that time. They started charging all sorts of fees that did not apply to they unit and were the absolute worst at replying to our many inquiries. Long story short this is a money hungry company who does not care about there tenants.

google_reviews.author: Lena
google_reviews.review:
Awful, when I moved in they hadn't painted, cleaned and the carpets were filthy.  They steadily raised the rates until it was so exorbitant moving out was the only option. Within two weeks of giving the notice to vacate they actively scheduled new showings, EVEN WALKING INTO MY HOME with potential renters, without my consent, without my permission, whilst I'm literally carrying boxes out.  Apparently a text was sufficient to allow themselves the privilege of trespassing and unlawful entry.  I'm not even going to get into the hyper-inflated magical "damage" fees there charging.

F-

google_reviews.author: Caitlen Richardson
google_reviews.review: They pressure tenants to move out not giving them enough time to find a new place and then threaten eviction if not done properly. Raised rent as much as they could not caring about how the world is right now recovering from Covid. Dont rent through this company

owner_response.text:
Hi Caitlen, we do not have a record of you renting or on any lease with Leading Edge in WA state.
We're sorry to hear you are experiencing a challenge in regard to moving with the company you are currently renting through.
At Leading Edge we do  analyze the current market and work with each client to discuss rent increases.  As members of NARPM, we work very hard to follow the WA state landlord tenant laws in regard to all timelines for the notices required to increase rent and/or move.

google_reviews.author: Kings Heating
google_reviews.review: We have enjoyed working with this Stacey at Leading Edge for years. Always pleasant, personable and polite. Prompt response time and always available when we call.- Des

google_reviews.author: denise Hindman
google_reviews.review: I would give them a negative 10 if I could....they were horrible at fixing issues, they were never there, they never answered the phone. They tried to charge us for issues that were due to the negligence of the owner of the property and would not refund our money when we had to stay in a hotel for 8 days. I would never recommend them to my worst enemy.

google_reviews.author: Samantha Callahan
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management has been nothing short of amazing. Our experience thus far has been a crazy one but they have been so patient with us and our situation.

owner_response.text: Thank you Samantha for your kind words, we are happy to hear you love the Leading Edge experience.

google_reviews.author: Jesus Fuentes
google_reviews.review: They are very helpful and knowledgeable with all aspects of the ever changing tenant and landlord laws. Very quick responding to my questions or concerns. Top notch team I highly recommend.

owner_response.text: Thank you Jesus, it's always a pleasure to work with you!

google_reviews.author: Coastline Tree Service
google_reviews.review: Stacey and her team are knowledgeable, caring and just a pleasure to work with in general. Thank you Stacey for all youve helped myself and my wife with. We will recommend you to everyone we can!

google_reviews.author: Ginger Carlson
google_reviews.review: We had been doing business via e-mails and they rented us a very nice house. Thank you Leading Edge  Property Management.

owner_response.text:
Hi Ginger,

Your kind words make our hearts smile. We are glad to hear you are enjoying your new home!

google_reviews.author: Mellodie Price
google_reviews.review: Its pretty messed up. when I schulde a showing and then they cancelled it dud to tenants are still moving then I reschulde the viewing for another day to have them message me back saying property is off the market.i will not recommend this management company to anyone!!I will make sure my friends and family don't go to this company for any reason

google_reviews.author: Owen Jones
google_reviews.review: Stacy is as professional as they get.  She is on top of her game and doesn't let anything slip through the cracks.  I Highly recommend her to manage your property

google_reviews.author: Stephen Selinger
google_reviews.review: Stacey and the entire team at Leading Edge Property Management are amazing! They are the property manager that you should be looking for! Highly recommended!!

owner_response.text: Thank you Stephen for your kind words!

google_reviews.author: Brent Grennell
google_reviews.review: I have been working with Stacey and team for over a decade.  Billing and work orders are seem-less. Staff is 100% friendly and professional.  They are the best. I highly highly recommend!!

owner_response.text: Thank you Brent, it is a pleasure working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Alex Othon
google_reviews.review: Stacey is an amazing and knowledgeable professional property manager who will take time to educate both owners and tenants so that they are well informed and never feel left in the dark.

owner_response.text: Thank you Alex for your kind words.  We are always happy to help!

google_reviews.author: Khoi Le
google_reviews.review: Love referring my clients in Washington to Stacey and co! I know they will get taken care of. And Im a very, very picky agent!

google_reviews.author: Kianna Olson
google_reviews.review: If I could leave a 0 stars I would. Virtual lead property management group with no urgency to help tenants over the phone. Im very disappointed. Do not expect to get much of your deposit back even if you left the space cleaner than when you moved in.

google_reviews.author: Scott Thompson
google_reviews.review: Wrongfully charged for items that were either damaged or missing before move in. Never calls you back and takes forever for them to get back to you. Only wants to talk when they want money. Do not be deceived...

owner_response.text:
Hi Scott,
We responded to your move out charge inquiry immediately.  We began our Security Deposit Review process and reviewed the move out charges again with the owner.  Per the owners decision, two charges were reversed on your account and a refund check was mailed to you. We thank you for your tenancy and wish you the best in the future.

google_reviews.author: Ryan Friesner
google_reviews.review: I live out of state and Leading Edge takes care of all my rentals for me.  Couldn't imagine doing it without them!

owner_response.text: Thank you Ryan, we appreciate your feedback and also enjoy working with you.

google_reviews.author: Robin Clay
google_reviews.review: They go above and beyond to help their tenants, very professional with great response time to fix any issues. I would highly recommend leading edge !

google_reviews.author: Teddy Keezer
google_reviews.review: Maria Mora was very helpful and got my shower working again!

google_reviews.author: Richard Sanders
google_reviews.review: Fast, curtious, and friendly!! If i have a problem they are right there on it and fixing the issue quickly!!! Great place to work with!!

owner_response.text: Thank you Richard, we are happy to hear you are happy renting one of the homes we manage.

google_reviews.author: Krista Sweeney
google_reviews.review: Renters beware, my experience was terrible and I would highly recommend finding another property under other management its not worth the added fees and dishonest actions you will be subjected to.

google_reviews.author: Russell Hathcock
google_reviews.review: As a fellow property management business owner I can vouch that Stacey runs a professional cutting edge property management business!

google_reviews.author: Scott Drake
google_reviews.review: Have left several emails and messages on their phone still no response on the review of the documents for the lease agreement trying to get question answered before signing the documents

owner_response.text: Hello Scott, Thank you for reaching out! We hate to hear you've had difficulties connecting with our team. It's our goal to respond to all inquiries as soon as possible, within one business day at the latest.  We are sorry this has not been your experience. We have shared your feedback and our team. We hope we were able to answer your questions when we called and emailed you back.

google_reviews.author: Ashley Brianne
google_reviews.review: Stacey is always so kind, professional and helpful with anything I need. I highly recommend her!

owner_response.text: Thank you Ashley for your kind words!  Always great doing business with you.

google_reviews.author: Steve Templin
google_reviews.review: I'm very pleased with the courteous and professional manner in which I was treated by Erik Morris and the LE staff.

owner_response.text: Thank you Steve, we are happy to hear you are enjoying your resident experience with us.

google_reviews.author: r sanders
google_reviews.review: Moving is never fun but the team at leading edge made it a very easy experience!! Tu again !!

google_reviews.author: sal borelli
google_reviews.review: my interactions with leading edge have been with the asst. manager, celese thomson.  being a senior citizen and lacking computer/technology aptitude and skills, celese has been heaven sent.  she is always willing and patiently helps me  navigate the system..... plus she is as pleasant and engaging as one could hope for.

owner_response.text: Thank you Sal for your kind words! We really enjoy working with you too.

google_reviews.author: Angela Lane
google_reviews.review: Gayle is always super helpful, answers all my questions and makes great suggestions!

google_reviews.author: Heena Khatri
google_reviews.review: I was referred to Stacey by an out of state property manager.  My experience with her has been nothing short of exceptional.  Stacey Salyer is a top notch property management professional and I highly recommend her for managing your real estate investments.  She is not only an industry leader, but dedicates much of her free time and energy to give back to the community and to her peers. If you have an investment property or a whole portfolio of properties, trust me, you've got to give Stacey a call.  You'll save yourself a whole lot of time, energy and frustration.

google_reviews.author: Logan Breen
google_reviews.review: Working with Stacey has always been an absolute pleasure!

google_reviews.author: Micah Varfolk
google_reviews.review: Horrible customer service, zero follow ups on any communication for weeks?

owner_response.text:
Hi, Micah,  
We do not have a record of you renting or on any lease with Leading Edge in WA state. We're sorry to hear you are experiencing a challenge in regard to receiving communication/follow-ups. At Leading Edge, we have a team email that is constantly monitored by our team members to ensure all communications are handled in a timely manner. Please feel free to reach out to our team email and one of our members will get back to you - care@leadingedgerealestate.info

google_reviews.author: yvonne lee
google_reviews.review: I was pleased with the response from both of the people i talked tp.

google_reviews.author: Jenny Ebbers
google_reviews.review: Stacey was very helpful and kind.

google_reviews.author: Scott Nelson
google_reviews.review: Very professional and prompt with all needs and requests

owner_response.text: Hi Scott, thank you for your kind words.  We enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Lupita Aybar
google_reviews.review: The truth is they are a terrible company, I have never had so much stress with companies before, I helped my brother apply, but it is so difficult to contact them because now it is all online, but that is not all when my brother entered the apartment many Things were not working and we tried to talk to them to fix it and they took a few days to go and they fixed things, the stove does not work completely, only three grills work and apart from that they are charging my brother to fix the heating. My brother has been trying to talk to them since last week and they haven't answered yet. That's why I dared to write here because I don't know what to do anymore, I'm desperate. The truth is, I'm not one of the people who writes comments. But I'm tired of being charged for things when they don't even answer you to give you an explanation.

owner_response.text: Thank you very much for the generous 5-star rating! We greatly appreciate your feedback and are delighted to have been able to assist you. We sincerely value your support and eagerly anticipate the opportunity to work with you again in the future.
Hi Jason, thank you for 5-star, we are happy to see you enjoy the house you rent from us!
Thank you Charles for the 5-star rating.  We are happy to hear you've been enjoying the service with Leading Edge!

yelp_reviews.author: Arynn M.
yelp_reviews.review:
I rented two units from SonRise in two years; both in the 808s. I have found the staff to be courteous and helpful both on the phone and in person. I had appliances break (dishwashers) in each apartment. They were replaced promptly and it was not taken out of my deposit. They were lenient and charged no fee for the one time we were late paying rent. It was only a day late, but still.  I got my full deposit back (minus like $10) from each house. The key is to remember the details; windows and sills, behind appliances, inside cabinets, etc. They give you a list, it's super easy. 

The two problems I ever had both involved the parking lot. 1) SonRise will never call a tow-truck company to move cars without passes. 2) When it snows they do not shovel and only sometimes salt. If you plan on living in one of their units take some initiative and sweep/shovel your own stairs and walk ways and move your cars to street parking when the flakes start falling if you want to get out the next morning.

owner_response.text: Hey there, Arynn. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We truly appreciate any comments we receive as it's a great way to gain unbiased insight on how we're doing. We're so glad to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc..

yelp_reviews.author: Balto S.
yelp_reviews.review:
worst management in all of Bellingham area. the landlords have dodge my emails and phone calls ask why they haven't fixed a roof leak which has cause mold to grow, it has been 2 months and going. A soon as we got a hold of someone we got hit with a 'we decided to now renew your lease" we have told them about our own dog being attacked by our neighbors aggressive poodle and had go out a buy a gun so if the guys dog tries to attack again we now have the right to shoot to kill his dog! now the property owners deserves to be held accountable for these unhabitable living conditions! All this happened in the last 2 years I been living here and my former roommate has moved out. All Son-Rise says "well since you were on a partial moveout were not going to look at any of your maintenance requests" SON-RISE property does discriminate against!

oh their new maintance guy is shitty! says if he has to come in a fix something  that isn't needing to be fixed he will falsely report as we broke it.

yelp_reviews.author: Bryce T.
yelp_reviews.review: I would give a 0 star if available they are a bad company they take your money and not fix anything when you need it fixed.I have mold in my apartment and they make me pay an extra $300 to have it removed because they don't want to fix the water leaks in the roof. We have cleaned it our self multiple times. And it just comes right back.

yelp_reviews.author: Paul L.
yelp_reviews.review: After being hustled to pay an application fee for a rental for my son, I waited several days and heard nothing back. I reached out for certainty and clarification. Nothing. A week passed and my son still had no place to live in Bellingham. I let go of Son-Rise and spat the bad taste from my mouth. What would Jesus do? Certainly not bait and go silent like this group did.

yelp_reviews.author: Hasina S.
yelp_reviews.review:
***I'll preface this by saying that we are not the type of people who post negative feedback on a public site, quite the contrary actually. We understand that humans are imperfect, and that we all are trying our best, but we want to warn the rest of the Bellingham community to stay away from Son-Rise.***

This was the worst experience I've ever had at a property management. My husband and I applied for a house with Son-Rise, along with one of our friends as a roommate. After 3 days of silence post submission of our applications, we reached out only to hear that we had "missing items" from our application. (This struck me as unprofessional, and awkward seeing that I was the one who had to seek THEM out to hear what I was missing versus the other way around.) Two days after we retrieved the missing items from our application, (items weren't even really missing, just lost in their emails) I called them back to see what our status was (since I didn't ever get a call from them) and found out there was yet ANOTHER item we were "missing." Twice I had to reach out to find what we owed. Twice they were vague about the items we needed to complete this process. After two more weeks of playing tag with this property management, we found out we needed a co-signer. After we sent in the application for the co-signer, they reached out (FINALLY) saying we needed to track down our rental reference, because they themselves couldn't get ahold of them. It has been another week since we got all of the loose ends tied up, and we still have not heard back from Son-Rise about the property. Not only was our time and money wasted, it was unappreciated. Such an awful experience with a property manager who couldn't care less about the livelihood of future tenants.

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We strive to make each customer experience a positive one and are disappointed that this wasn't the case for you. We would appreciate feedback on how we can improve and make your visit memorable for the right reasons. Please call (360) 738-3700 at your earliest convenience.

yelp_reviews.author: Melissa S.
yelp_reviews.review: This review is specifically for Virginia who works for Son-Rise. Virginia is the property manager for a condo I had lived in up until recently. She is horrible at her job and should be removed from her position immediately. She takes sides in neighbor disputes and is the most condescending and rude a hole I have ever had the misfortune of speaking with. The way that she speaks to people (and I am one of four other people who have said similar things about her) is never okay in any situation, but as someone who works for the owners of the condo she should definitely not be rude to owners. If you ask her a question, she acts like the whole world is falling apart and speaks to you like you're a child. Selling the condo was the best thing I ever did, and I celebrate never having to look at her or speak to her again. Cheers!!

owner_response.text: We are sorry to hear that your experience was not an exceptional one. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 as we want to hear your concerns and address them in the most suitable way. We look forward to hearing from you.

yelp_reviews.author: Susan W.
yelp_reviews.review:
Not thrilled to find the amount of compact snow & ice covering walkways & stairs. Someone could break a hip!
( it's been days in this condition)
According to Washington Landlord/Tenant law- the property managers will be liable when that occurs.

owner_response.text: Hey there, Karin. Our customers are very important to us and we are sorry to hear we may have let you down! Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can improve.

yelp_reviews.author: Jenn E.
yelp_reviews.review: Ok you guys this is beyond the worst management company I've ever dealt with! I have rented at places in Miami, Los Angeles, Laguna Beach and Scottsdale which all are high well educated places. Ever since I started renting from this company it's been nothing but a hassle first week of renting their asked to up my rent because they had made a mistake on the price and asked for more money? Then I had signed a six-month lease with the option to renew for another year after living here for 60 days they had told me the owner is selling the place and I will not be able to re-sign my lease for another year. And then as a renter it is my job to maintain the yard as in no trash don't make it look sloppy if my grass is a little too long that's my opinion and I have got asked to cut the grass for the realtor to stage photos which I will be leaving in 10 days and I'm traveling in those 10 days while trying to move there telling me if I don't they're taking it out of my damage deposit which isn't right. I have a life and my life isn't mowing the grass if it's too long as a realtor or management company that's their responsibility they think it's out of control.  There all under graduated people working there that I don't think know what they're talking about and their guessing they're rude not respectful people. Please never rent from them you will regret it and get taken advantage of!

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to discuss how we can improve. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

yelp_reviews.author: Tim M.
yelp_reviews.review: I don't expect the red carpet to be rolled out for my money.  I don't even need the people to smile or be happy.  But the staff at the front desk is so rude and they acted like the three questions I asked were just too much for them to trouble themselves with.  Then after I was approved for the apartment I wanted to move into, it was more of the same.  So I went elsewhere.  Maybe they were just having a bad day. But is it that hard to be polite and smile?

yelp_reviews.author: Mariachristina R.
yelp_reviews.review: Worse place to rent from in all of Bellingham. We had a signed lease saying no one could enter our apartment unless we were home, that doesn't mean anything to them or at least the people they have working for them, maintenance guys where in our apartment while we were out to come home and them be in our bedroom saying they were fixing the doors? Nothing was wrong with bedroom doors and we didn't okay it. Worse one was when one maintenance guy let himself in and sat on the couch watching tv with my 7year old son while i was taking a shower, VERY MESSED UP, again entered without any permission or warning. Last but not lease they don't keep there word for anything. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE. rent from someone else. 1800 Alabama Street threw Son-Rise is the worse place to rent in Bellingham. I would rather live at the mission.

owner_response.text: We're sorry to hear your experience with us was less than amazing. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 so we can better understand what happened. We look forward to hearing from you.

yelp_reviews.author: Cameron F.
yelp_reviews.review: Lived in one of their brand new houses for a total of 2 years. As for bothering tenants they are fine, barely interacted with us. Yet the company is extremely unprofessional. To start, we were told when moving in "We installed wood chips so that yard work will not be involved with the house" then later received a notification that we needed to remove weeds that were growing. Glad they gave us an unusable heinous yard yet still expected us to maintain it like it was grass. They did inform us 24 hours in advance of yearly inspection, but they never informed us when the owner would randomly show up. A few times the owner would show up at our door without giving us any prior knowledge and inform us he was there to replace a filter or something (we always let him in because the owner is actually a super awesome guy, son-rise is the problem). We also informed them that our glass chandelier broke when our tall roommate hit it with his head, they never helped us fix or replace it, yet charged us at the end. We told them we were moving out 3 months before the end of the lease, which they forgot about until we had to remind them 10 days before our move-out. Now for the real KICKER: we put a couple thousand dollars down in the deposit. When we moved out we asked them when we would receive it. They said "we have 21 days until we have to send it". A month later I asked where it was and there response was "Since no one informed us of an address to send it to, we mailed it to the house you leased from us." YES! Son-rise mailed an extremely valuable check to a VACANT house which is up for rent even though they have permanent addresses from the 3 people on the lease. Communicating with this company slightly feels like you are talking to a kindergarten class. Nice in person but I swear to god, behind closed doors they are as chaotic as a propane factory hosting a fireball juggling tournament. Bellingham rental companies are not the best and take advantage of college kids, so pick your poison.

owner_response.text: Our team wants to extend our sincerest apologies. We have listened to your feedback and have changed our policy regarding security deposits. We hope you will give us an opportunity to discuss your concerns further with you. You can reach out to us at (360) 738-3700. Thank you.

yelp_reviews.author: Kathryn D.
yelp_reviews.review: My roommate and I were both quite put off by the knowledge of staff here. They will constantly give us two different answers, and then we're stuck in the middle trying to figure out who is right. After making the drive up from Seattle to close out my part of the lease, I came back to find out that they needed me to sign something else. This was extremely frustrating, and I think that they need to develop some sort of standardization for their moves, since they currently don't seem to know the process (which is one that they are constantly dealing with) for move outs. I'd look to other rental agencies.

owner_response.text: Hello Kathryn. We're sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience. Please call us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know more.

yelp_reviews.author: Sarah H.
yelp_reviews.review:
DO NOT RENT FROM THESE PEOPLE... regardless of how nice the property is. Every time we have an issue at our house, it takes days from them to call a maintenance guy or plumber.. even when it is an emergency! One of the front desk receptionists is extremely rude, and every time we call we have a very unpleasant experience. There is no customer service what-so-ever and they make everything a way bigger deal than it should be. I have rented for seven years from other rental agencies in the same town and i have never had such a bad experience in my rental history. We have spent countless hours away from work to allow workers into our home to fix appliances, windows, plumbing... you name it! .

Avoid this company at all costs...

yelp_reviews.author: Amanda B.
yelp_reviews.review: I have been well-taken care of at son-rise. I took over the lease of a friend who moved away. The apartment is fairly well taken care of and any little issues that I have had, I have only had to call and things were taken care of. I appreciate how friendly they are, and how quickly they they got me into that place. I pay my rent online and I haven't had any problems.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the wonderful review, Amanda! We're happy to hear you had an awesome time with us at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.. We hope you stop by and see us again soon!

yelp_reviews.author: John G.
yelp_reviews.review: I don't usually write reviews for this kind of stuff because it's a waste of my time. However, I have had a really good experience with son rise reality. They always are there to help and are not trying to screw people on little stuff. They were very understanding whenever there was a problem and were quick to rectify any mistakes. Best rental place in Bellingham that I have had.

owner_response.text: That is so amazing to hear, John! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day!

yelp_reviews.author: ashley h.
yelp_reviews.review: Very rude and terrible service. Do NOT rent from them - you will regret it. One of the worst property management companies in Bellingham! They don't take care of their properties and they are rude to tenants.

owner_response.text: Hello Ashley. While we are thankful for your feedback, we would like to learn more about why your experience was not an exceptional one. Reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can improve.

yelp_reviews.author: S B.
yelp_reviews.review: Absolutely horrible. Do not rent. Withheld over half of our security deposit for unspecified extra "cleaning" (my family scrubbed it from top to bottom) and Sandy has been ignoring our calls for a month now. Parking was a nightmare, employees rude, unit shabby. We were told we had a 10 month lease, that's the only reason we went there then on moving in day, they say that's not true and that the lady who told us that is no longer with them. They are taking advantage of young people because they think they can get away with it. Go somewhere where you will be respected.

owner_response.text: We're extremely sorry that you had to face such difficulties. We pride ourselves on providing great service and we'd like to do the same for you. We may not be able to change the past, but if you give us a chance, we can work to make things right. Please give our office a call at (360)738-3700 at your earliest convenience. Thank you.

yelp_reviews.author: Willow B.
yelp_reviews.review: I was pretty impressed with Son-rise. They were our property manager for a year. We had few repairs but they did them pretty fast when needed. They generally communicated promptly with us. I was most impressed that we got our whole deposit (minus a small carpet cleaning fee) back. This honest behavior is fairly uncommon in Bellingham as our last two property managers tried to steal our deposit and had to be threatened with legal action to surrender the money. Definitely one of the better property manager in a city full of sleazy ones.

yelp_reviews.author: Rebecca H.
yelp_reviews.review: I recently worked with Kandis Lindgren on a duplex listing I handled for a seller in the South Hill neighborhood. Kandis was the account manager for the property and does a great job for her clients. She was also helpful, kind and considerate throughout the listing process. She keeps the tenants happy and takes good care of an owner's property.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your five-star review, Rebecca. Our team at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc. always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Until next time, take care!

yelp_reviews.author: Thomas V.
yelp_reviews.review: Don't trust them. They are fake and manipulative. They reference Jesus in their company name, but there is nothing saintly about how they treat their tenants. Our house was in terrible shape when we moved in, big holes in the wall, weird stains, wood floors that give you splinters, and the house was white but covered in filth. "We're the dirty house on the corner" we would say. But it was cheap and in a good location. It wasn't until we started getting harassing emails about our lawn needing mowed that we started to realize that their quality of professionalism is as cheap as the rent. We mowed our lawn every few weeks but they kept charging us as if they had to pay someone for lawn service. When we moved out we cleaned the house and garage way better than it was before we moved in. They charged us for 12 hours of 'cleaning', batteries, carpet cleaning (there was one room with carpet) and other random fees I've never experienced before. We made sure all batteries and lights worked before we left, and We scrubbed that housed. I called them and they were extremely rude, told me they couldn't do a walk through with us because someone else had moved in already. And then hung up on me. Very Christ like. I went over to the house, it was empty and all the windows were open. I peaked in and the house had definitely not had 12 hours of anything done to it since we left nor was anyone living there yet.

owner_response.text: We're sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience. Please call us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know more.

yelp_reviews.author: Spam M.
yelp_reviews.review: Super easy to work with and never invade your space. They make everything easy and enjoyable and they will come to the property for maintenance or help anytime. Wish they had more houses on the market right now so I could stay with them :(

owner_response.text: We appreciate your kind review of Son-Rise Property Management, Inc. and hope you will visit us again soon. As a valued customer, we look forward to taking care of your needs in the future. Until we see you, take care!

yelp_reviews.author: Patrick S.
yelp_reviews.review:
I've had a horrible experience with this rental company. When we moved into the house it was full of items from the previous tenants and not in particularly good shape. When we moved out they kept half of our deposit for cleaning even though we thoroughly scrubbed the house and I have never had my deposit withheld from previous landlords. They put a bill on our account in error, told us twice that they would remove it since they agreed it was in error, never took it off, and then deducted that from our deposit as well. The most frustrating part however was how incredibly and consistently condescending they were to us, constantly referring to us as "kids" and "college students" when my roommates and I are graduate students and teachers in our late 20's and early 30's. They seemed to think we were idiots who had never rented before. When I informed them that the house had mold (our lease said that they would take care of mold) they kept telling me that it probably wasn't mold and I was just confused about what mold looked like. If you do rent from them be sure to well document everything and get things in writing, especially if you are younger since they seem to see that as an opportunity to take advantage of you. 
Might be helpful:
http://www.tenantsunion.org/en/rights

yelp_reviews.author: Shay V.
yelp_reviews.review: I really  wanted to like Son-Rise. I loved the apartment, and the service was great when we were signing our lease but the past months have completely changed my perspective. As we prepared to move out we began to find out about all the extra fees and cleaning charges they require you to pay (even if you leave your apartment spotless). This would have been fine if they had been outright about it from the start but all we got was sweet talking and patronizing lectures. They have truly been quite rude to us. Basically, this is just another one of those realty companies that does whatever possible to take money from defenseless tenants. When  we finally moved out they ended up charging us for the time the apartment was vacant even though we had specifically asked them if they would only charge us to the day we vacated. Again, all I ask is that you say things outright and not twist legal language to your profit, is that too much to ask. These are sleazy untrustworthy people, don't do business with them.

yelp_reviews.author: m. m.
yelp_reviews.review: Don't do business here. The agent where I rented a few years said he has many many apartments to manage. The company doesn't have enough employees to take care of apartment problems. One agent forgot to respond for a whole year. Son-Rise runs on a shoe-string budget, if you make the mistake to rent from the company don't expect much in return for the high rents charged. I'm not a university student but I think that's their attitude about everyone. The web site is pretty words but some of it's claims are false in my direct experience. They didn't always screen applicants for the best of renters, believe me.

yelp_reviews.author: Heather P.
yelp_reviews.review: Sonrise has been an awful property management company. It took them 3 months and 4 separate visits to my apartment to find a fix a basic leak. I'm assuming it took them this long because they hired people who would work for cheap and acted completely unprofessional, not giving my roommate and i proper amounts of time before they entered our apartment. They have left multiple notes on our doors telling us how much money the leak has cost them yet the only reason it cost as much as it did is because they did not maintain the plumbing system previous to the leak.

yelp_reviews.author: Lauren T.
yelp_reviews.review: The place looked nice, but when I moved in I asked them to replace the electrical panel that they had left off, and the closet doors.  That never happened.  Also, the toilet ran the whole year.  The dryer was taking longer and longer to dry clothes, up to 3 hours by the time I moved out.  Asked them for 6 months to fix it.  The dishwasher detergent dispenser didn't work.  Even though they wouldn't fix anything, they certainly have alot of rules for their tenants to follow.    In general just a frustrating experience.

yelp_reviews.author: Ian T.
yelp_reviews.review:
Renter beware. My wife and I just finished renting from Son-Rise in August. We had nothing but issues in our dealings with this rental company. I can provide proof for nearly all of my issues below. 
Here is why I would steer clear of Son-Rise:
- Unit was never cleaned prior to moving in
- Water stains on floor of unit had not been fixed as I was told they had been
- Dishwasher never worked properly
- Numerous light bulbs were burned out when I moved in
- Fixing my hot water heater took 3 visits from two different maintenance men
- A bullet hole that occurred in my wall was never repaired. At first I was told it would be my cost to fix as it was not a result of the units owner. When I pressed the issue, Son-Rise agreed to fix it at their cost. It was never repaired while I lived in the unit.
- Upon terminating my lease (admittedly late, but only by three days) I was responsible for September's rent (moved out in August). Within the rights of Washington Landlord-Tenant law.
- Paid September rent knowing our unit had been viewed by multiple people and an application had been submitted prior to the end of August.
- Was never informed when a new lease was signed (When a new lease is signed, I would be due a prorated amount of September's rent).
- I found out a new renter was in the unit when I contacted the energy company to arrange my last bill.
- I was only refunded rent when I contacted Son-Rise and pressed the issue about the rent as well as some absurd charges made on my deposit (fire alarm batteries for $45?)
-Oh, beware of the automatic $25 taken out of your deposit as "Administrative Fee"

Some other items to be warned about are the poorly written lease (several sections seem to say one thing, but Son-Rise interprets them another). The company overworks their employees (in my opinion) and this slows down all action on maintenance requests outside of legally required responses (so water/electric/heat) as well as any inquiries. I could continue, but would begin entering my personal feelings and not fact. The only reason that I gave Son-Rise two stars is that the rent was easily cheaper by $100 a month than elsewhere and that they did end up refunding the rent due to me in addition to most of the charges to my deposit (and I still contend they owe me all but the $25, but getting that would cost me a lawyer and that costs more than the other charges)

yelp_reviews.author: Gabe I.
yelp_reviews.review: By far the worst rental agency I have ever had to deal with. On the initial walk through on the house I rented I was told many things that were going to be done which never did get done during the year I was there.  There were three locks on the home and of the three keys I was given only one worked on one door. Very unprofessional.

yelp_reviews.author: Michelle J.
yelp_reviews.review: I have been renting from them for over a year...and now we are having a plumbing issue. I work at Gary's Plumbing and Heating and we have amazing technicians and trust their work. We are licensed and bonded just to note. On the phone to the front desk lady I was calling in my plumbing issue and asked ya know "hey I work at Gary's Plumbing and Heating and is there anyway..." Didn't even get to finish my sentence before she cut me off and said "they have to be licensed and bonded" and I said "Oh of course they are.." cut off again I got to hear "Um yea, so no". Rude much? And when she asked is it okay for us to enter your home while you're not there and I said no, I'd would like to be there, she almost sounded like "well.....okaaaaay". Yes, well okay...do not enter my home without my permission while I am not there. End of story. So now I'm a little apprehensive whether they will actually follow what I asked and hope I don't show up from work to see someone I don't know in my house.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback, Michelle. We're sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience. Please call us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know more.

summary.text:
Good

PURE Property Management of Washington has some tenants singing high praises, particularly highlighting the ease and professionalism experienced during the move-in process. A number of reviews commend the smooth transition into their properties thanks to attentive and caring staff members like Celese, who seems to play a significant role in elevating tenant experiences. Additionally, property owners have expressed satisfaction with PURE's proactive approach, appreciating their reliability and commitment to prioritizing the owners' best interests, often praising specific staff members for their dedication.

For several clients, communication with PURE Property Management has been smooth, making them feel supported and well-informed. This sentiment is echoed by those who appreciate the quick handling of maintenance requests and the clear, timely communication facilitated by the company's team. The positive experiences are significant enough to garner multiple recommendations from satisfied customers, who acknowledge the company's dedication and attention to detail in managing their properties effectively.

Great

Tenants and landlords alike have expressed their gratitude towards PURE Property Management for their exemplary service and professionalism. A recurring theme in reviews is the straightforward and hassle-free interaction with company representatives such as Gayle and Stacey, who are frequently lauded for their exceptional customer service. Clients highlight how efficiently the company manages their listings and openly discuss the confidence they have in PURE's ability to understand and meet their needs.

Maintenance issues are reported to be handled with care, ensuring tenants feel valued and supported—a claim backed by several glowing reviews from long-term renters. PURE's commitment to providing a seamless renting experience is evidently appreciated, with satisfied tenants admiring both the quick resolution of issues and the friendly approach of employees towards everyday challenges, thus cementing their reputation as a trusted choice in the property management sector.

Bad

There are, however, criticisms suggesting certain deficiencies in customer service and property maintenance from PURE Property Management. Some tenants have encountered delayed responses to pressing maintenance requests, such as unresolved complaints about unsafe living conditions including broken walls and hot water issues. These instances of slow communication have left some customers feeling neglected and undervalued.

Furthermore, a few reviews mention difficulties in getting timely feedback on important rental and maintenance concerns. Cases where tenants felt their living conditions were not given adequate attention raise concerns about the company's capability to manage renter issues swiftly and effectively. While these problems are not the majority, they mark areas that could benefit from improvement, particularly in enhancing response times and addressing maintenance complaints more promptly.

Ugly

The most severe complaints regarding PURE Property Management come from tenants who describe significant frustrations with how they were treated, leading to deeply negative experiences. Issues like withheld security deposits or added fees for alleged damages were highlighted, with some tenants feeling that they were unfairly charged or their deposits unjustly deducted. Complaints about property conditions, such as reports of units with insufficient safety features or false advertising, have been voiced, further impacting negative perceptions.

More seriously, some tenants felt misled about contract terms or poorly managed by the company's communication gaps. Incidents where customer service was deemed rude or uncooperative have exacerbated dissatisfaction among those affected, contributing to their distrust of PURE's practices. These critical reviews underscore a significant gap between tenant expectations and lived experiences, suggesting a need for PURE to reevaluate its approaches to handling tenant concerns and contract transparency to improve overall service quality and customer relations.
summary.disclaimer: Pure Property Management of Washington is relatively new to the Bellingham area, having acquired Son-Rise Property management. It is unclear whether Son-Rise simply rebranded, or whether PURE replaced property managers with their own.
